remarks: Imaginary part of an integral.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgcnval.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgcnval.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgim $p |- ( ph -> ( Im ` S. A B _d x ) = S. A ( Im ` B ) _d x ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
